application.name: Hercules Studio
application.summary: GUI front-end to the Hercules mainframe Emulator

description.p: Hercules Studio is a GUI front-end to the Hercules mainframe Emulator. With Hercules Studio, you can easily control and monitor the hercules virtual machine.
To use Hercules Studio the hercules emulator must have previously been instaled. Hercules must be built with GUI support.
